comment: Calloway is the worst "professor" I've ever had. He was the coordinator for my senior internship and it was an absolute joke. The class was extremely disorganized and getting in contact with him is impossible. Our class was not a priority to Calloway. I can't believe that we had to pay tuition to receive "instruction" from him.
Very talkative, but is very interesting. His guidelines for this course were never clear. Very easy class. Honestly felt like I never did any work in his class.
One of the best professors at KSU. He takes a genuine interest in his students and their long term success. Willing to talk with and help out any student who walks in his door.

Professor Calloway is one of the BEST professors at KSU. He is extremely caring and passionate about helping students. He is a great mentor and informational source and will help you figure out what you want to do career wise, as well as guide you in the right direction to get there. I strongly encourage you to take him!!

Best teacher you will ever have! The only reason why I stayed at Kennesaw! He LOVES his students, and most of class is a discussion. He is funny, and loves to keep his class in a light mood! Would take him every class if I could! TAKE HIM! Test are hard, but he curves up to 30 points!

The best professor you will take while you're at Kennesaw. Absolutely amazing, and has a lot of experience in the field he teaches on. I would literally take him for every class if I could. Do not buy the book though, it all comes from what he says in class.
I was taking from another professor who was mean.. calloway is the way to go..don't take from anyone else
Seriously, don't bother doing this GEN ED with anyone else!!!  EASY A
Prof. Calloway is very enthusiastic about his job and  is very helpful. The tests are fairly easy and the groups project at the end is as well.
